original_text: Now the people of Reuben and the people of Gad had a very great number of livestock. And they saw the land of Jazer and the land of Gilead, and behold, the place was a place for livestock.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손은 심히 많은 가축 떼를 가졌더라 그들이 야셀 땅과 길르앗 땅을 본즉 그 곳은 목축할 만한 장소인지라

sentences.original_text: had a very great number of livestock.
And they saw the land of Jazer and the land of Gilead
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 야셀 땅과 길르앗 땅을 보았는데

sentences.original_text: the place was a place for livestock.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 가축을 기르기에 아주 좋은 곳이었습니다.
